name: segment_subregions
description: Cross-sectional and longitudinal segmentation for brain structures like thalamus, brainstem, and hippo-amygdala.

inputs.name: Structure
inputs.description: Structure to segment. Options are: thalamus, brainstem, hippo-amygdala.

inputs.name: Cross-sectional Subject
inputs.description: Subject to segment in cross-sectional analysis.

inputs.name: Longitudinal Base Subject
inputs.description: Base subject for longitudinal analysis. Timepoints are extracted from the base-tps file.

inputs.name: Subjects Directory
inputs.description: Specify subjects directory (will override SUBJECTS_DIR env variable).

inputs.name: Temporary Directory
inputs.description: Use alternative temporary directory. This will get deleted unless --debug is enabled.

inputs.name: Output Directory
inputs.description: Use alternative output directory (only for cross-sectional). Default is the subject's `mri` directory.

inputs.name: Number of Threads
inputs.description: Number of threads to use. Defaults to 1.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
